casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Angela C. GRASSO Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 15, 2019

Alice Osedach, senior assistant public defender, in support of the petition.

Rocco A. Chiarenza, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 189 Conn. App. 186, 207 A.3d 33 (2019), is denied.
